h2. My Desktop Buckets

{{html:
<table ng-app="myApp" ng-controller="ListDesktopBucketsController" class="table table-striped table-bordered">
    <thead>
        <tr>
            <th></th>
            <th></th>
            <th>Name</th>
            <th>Number of users</th>
            <th>Storage</th>
            <th>Number of data locations</th>
        </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
        <tr ng-repeat="bucket in buckets">
            <td><a href="Main Office">Edit Package</a></td>
            <td><a href="Connecting">Manage</a></td>
            <td>{[bucket.projectName]}</td>
            <td>{[bucket.users.length]}</td>
            <td>{[bucket.storage]}GB</td>
            <td>{[numOfDataLocations(bucket)]}</td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table>
<hr>
<table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
<thead>
<tr><th> </th><th> </th><th>Name </th><th>Number of users </th><th>Storage </th><th>Number of data locations </th></tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr><td> <a href="Main Office">Edit Package</a> </td><td> <a href="Connecting">Manage</a> </td><td> Main Office </td><td> 7 </td><td> 140GB </td><td> 2 </td></tr>
<tr><td> <a href="Main Office">Edit Package</a> </td><td><a href="Connecting">Manage</a>  </td><td> Sattelite Office </td><td> 5 </td><td> 100GB </td><td> 1 </td></tr>
 </tbody>
 <table>
